column1: 48948935$Masked Beast Des Gardius$$DARK$[Fiend/effect]$$$$$8$3300$2500$$$$This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 2 monsters
column2: including at least 1 "Grand Tiki Elder" or "Melchid the Four-Face Beast". When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard
column3: equip 1 "The Mask of Remnants" from your Deck to 1 monster on the field.$$$$$

column1: 22610082$The Mask of Remnants$$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Normal$$$Shuffle this card into its owner's Deck
column2: OR if this card was put into play by the effect of "Masked Beast Des Gardius"
column3: this card is treated as an Equip Card. Control of the equipped monster is switched.$$$$$
